casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Russell William TUCKER. No. 113A96-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 23, 2006. Robert L. McClellan, Greensboro, for Tucker. Danielle Marquis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of June 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of June 2006."
